{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Weeping Willow of the Lake|It|The Weeping Willow of the Lake}} is a large willow tree that grows at the center of a lake in Erinnyes Forest. Its roots seem to extend underwater.</p>}}

The willow's condition is tied to the health of the water veins.<ref>{{Ref/VP|Erinnyes's Watery Weeping Willow}}</ref> Prior to cleansing the [[Roots of Erinnyes]] during the {{Quest|The Wild Fairy of Erinnyes}}, the entire lake area appears a sickly yellow. Afterwards, it turns a vibrant blue. The change is correspondingly reflected on the Map.
